explanation: [0-0] One hand is holding a steamer basket, while the other hand is holding a transparent object inside the basket.

[0-6] A person wearing a gray shirt and an apron, holding the same circular device, is standing beside two water tanks and a large pot of water. One of the water tanks contains a milky white liquid. The man scoops up a spoonful of the milky white liquid from the tank and pours it into the circular device, then scoops up another spoonful and pours it into the device. He then places the circular device into the water in the pot and rotates it several times.
